0.8.1.name: wordpress/zingiri-apps-builder
0.8.1.description:
This plugin has been discontinued.

Please visit us at APhPS if you're interested in the commercial version.

Build sophisticated, secure web database applications without programming. With the Zingiri Application Builder you can add/search/edit/delete data in your web database. Data Entry forms have full vallidation, prevent alpha characters being entered in numeric fields, have a calendar for dates, and can lookup relational data in other tables. The search form allows multiple field searches. The paged data summary allows ordering by a particular field. Using Zingiri Application Builder, novice users can create sophisticated web applications without any programming. Zingiri Apps is composed of the Builder, a tool allowing you to build applications & forms and the Player, a tool allowing you to play those applications & forms.
